column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police from Phnom Penh’s Office of Immigration Investigation and Procedure arrested a foreigner on April 12
column6: with a Canadian passport was caught by Chamkar Morn police on April 9 in possession of illegal drugs at the Casa le Meridian Condo
column10: police said. (*This is the s------ame building and floor that a young woman------ jumped from that same day)------The Bureau of Investigation then questioned him and found he last entered on February 22
column12: 2020) through PPIA.------He was then sent to the Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital for a COVID-19 test. Currently
column13: the Bureau is questioning him and continuing the legal process.------* A man with the same name and age was ------previously wanted in Canada------ for firearms offences.
